comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.text: The extra options in the perfherder data is very important for us to be able to distinguish between multiple data streams and right now it doesn't take it into account, this needs to be fixed.
comments.raw_text: The extra options in the perfherder data is very important for us to be able to distinguish between multiple data streams and right now it doesn't take it into account, this needs to be fixed.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.raw_text: This patch adds the extra options settings to the visual metrics perfherder data by passing it through the jobs.json file.
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9144695
Bug 1634185 - Add extra options to visual metrics perfherder data. r?#perftest


This patch adds the extra options settings to the visual metrics perfherder data by passing it through the jobs.json file.
